groceries.name: Banana Blossom
groceries.description: Flower of the banana tree. *Great deep fried*

groceries.name: Buddha's Hand
groceries.description: An unusually shaped citron variety whose fruit is segmented into finger-like sections, resembling those seen on representations of Buddha. *Only 4 have ever been produced!*

groceries.name: Bacon Mints
groceries.description: With bacon-flavored breath mints, you can taste bacon anytime.

groceries.name: Canned Cheeseburger
groceries.description: With a shelf life of twelve months, this lightweight snack is the ideal fast food treat for the wilderness.

groceries.name: Unicorn Meat
groceries.description: For those looking to increase their magical abilities!

groceries.name: Precooked Scrambled Eggs
groceries.description: Just add hot water for a delicious quick breakfast!

groceries.name: Emu Jerky
groceries.description: High in protein with a great flavour

groceries.name: Fish Roe Spread
groceries.description: The poor man's caviar. This popular spread is made from fish roe combined with pureed vegetables, and various herbs and spices
